citeinfo.title: California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection, GIS Maps & Data

descript.abstract: This polygon shapefile contains data from the California Tree Seed Zone Map published by CAL FIRE. This map is an inventory system that classifies seeds for collection and planting by psysiographic zones.
